title: Ghost of Yōtei's gorgeous gameplay deep dive reveals refined combat, lo-fi beats mode, and more
description: Ghost of Tsushima's gorgeous PlayStation 5 sequel Ghost of Yōtei is inching ever-closer to release, and ahead of its October arrival, developer Sucker Punch has shared its best look yet at what the revenge-soaked open-world action-adventure will bring - including, it turns out, a lo-fi beats mode for a more soothing saunter through Ezo. Read more
author: Matt Wales

title: Unlocked iPhones Are Hundreds Of Dollars Off At Amazon For Prime Day
description: iPhone 16 Pro $816 - $935 See at Amazon iPhone 15 Pro Max $714 - $849 See at Amazon iPhone 14 / 13 / 12 $194 - $458 See at Amazon iPhone SE 3rd Gen $194 (was $260) See at Amazon If you're looking to upgrade your iPhone, several professionally refurbished models are on sale during Amazon's Prime Day 2025 sale, which ends July 11. Each of the discounted iPhones is certified through the Amazon Renewed Premium program. While these are pre-owned, they're all in full working order, usually just a step away from brand-new in quality. According to Amazon, each item has been professionally inspected, tested, and cleaned by professionals, and there are "no visible cosmetic imperfections" when the item is held at arm's length. The only real loss here is the box, as Amazon will instead ship these iPhones out in generic packaging. Products are also eligible for a replacement or refund within 90 days. Note that these deals are only available to Amazon Prime members, so you'll need an active subscription to get the lowest price. Join Amazon Prime The upshot of choosing one of the refurbished models listed below is that they're all unlocked, meaning you can use them with your current service provider or take them with you if you decide to switch to a different company in the future. As for the discounted iPhones, there are a variety of models on sale here, though the iPhone Pro 16 is the best of the bunch, and you can grab one for as low was $816 (was $979). To be fair, smartphone design is very iterative these days, so even the iPhone 15 Pro Max or iPhone 14 are still worth picking up while they're discounted, especially if you haven't upgraded in a while. iPhone Pro and Pro Max models offer more power, better batteries, larger screens, and enhanced cameras compared to the standard models. There's also the larger Pro Max comes down to size mainly, with the Pro Max offering Apple's best hardware of the year on a larger scale.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The Last Of Us Cooperative Strategy Game Gets First Big Discount For Prime Day
description: The Last of Us: Escape the Dark, an officially licensed board game based on Naughty Dog's hit PlayStation series, has received its first major discount. Fans can save 25% on the cooperative strategy game at Amazon, dropping the price from $75 to $56. This Prime Day deal is available to all shoppers and is expected to disappear July 12 at 12 AM PT, unless it sells out before then. The Last of Us: Escape the Dark Board Game $56 (was $75) Based on the hit series, The Last of Us: Escape the Dark was first announced back in 2022 but didn't hit store shelves until November 2024. It has earned pretty solid reviews so far and is the latest addition to Themeborne's well-received Escape the Dark tabletop strategy series.Each player picks a major character from Quarantine Zone--Joel, Ellie, Tommy, Bill, Tess, or Marlene--and embark on a perilous trek to Jackson. Along the way, you’ll encounter various scenarios via chapter cards, which put you up against FEDRA agents, the Infected, and other obstacles. Your only way to survive is quick thinking and constantly upgrading your weapons, ensuring you always have the best gear available for your next battle.Though designed as a cooperative survival-strategy game for up to five players, Escape the Dark is fully playable as a solo experience, too. More and more tabletop games seem to be offering solo modes these days, which is nice for fans who may not be able to get together with friends as often as they'd like.The game board and all its pieces look pretty sharp, too, thanks to Escape the Dark's black-and-white color scheme that captures foreboding atmosphere of the video games and TV series.Escape the Dark is recommended for players ages 14 and up. Each run takes anywhere from 60-90 minutes.Here's what you'll find inside the box:Game Board6 Survivor Boards6 Survivor Dice6 Survivor Tokens35 Chapter Cards3 Boss Chapter Cards5 Location Clear Cards2 Rules Reference CardsOver 100 Weapon, Item, Crafting, Special Ability, and QZ CardsOver 100 Tokens and MarkersIf you want to take a closer look at the ruleset and box contents, you can download a PDF of the official rule book from Themeborne's site. See at Amazon Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 885
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Do you keep backups of your favorite products? These days, the only backups I buy are things I know I’ll finish on a regular basis (like shampoo and conditioner, or body lotion). I don’t even bother with makeup backups anymore, though. If I finish something like a blush or an eyebrow pencil, great, and if it’s still around when it’s time to restock, that’s even better. If it’s discontinued, I might mourn it a little bit, but there’s always something new coming out, and I don’t mind trying new things, so I don’t stress about it too much. 2. Something that you read/watched/listened to recently that was surprisingly great? I watched “KPop Demon Hunters” on Netflix with Connor over the weekend, and I was surprised to enjoy[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 885 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 884
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Do you have a favorite vegetable? Yes! Carrots, for sure. The fact that you can turn them into a cake is a big deal! I mean, come on, have you ever heard of a broccoli cake? Or an okra cake? Yeah, I didn’t think so, LOL! I also love that you can put them in salads, roast them or just eat them plain with a variety of different dips. 2. A song that’s been stuck in your head lately? “Top of the World” by The Carpenters has been on repeat in my car. 3. Something you’ve been avoiding lately? Social media and the news cycle in general. 4. Lip masks: yes or no? Yes, but only if we’re talking Laneige. 5. Whatcha reading right now? “The Mysterious[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 884 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
